In connection with iminosugars, Zavesca ® was recently found to reduce the amyloid plaque production in a cell model
27 . Compain and co-workers analysed the cholinesterase inhibition of a series of iminosugars with different substituents motifs and stereochemistry
28 . In our research group, we recently combined 1-DNJ with a selenoureido appendage to achieve strong β-glucosidase and AChE inhibitors
29 . To the best of our knowledge, these are the only examples of iminosugars exhibiting anti-Alzheimer’s properties.
